title: Chiropractor Baxter MN | Special Offer for New Patients
description: Baxter Chronic Pain 56425 | The team at Axness Integrative Medicine offers the best chiropractic care for back pain, neck pain, and more!
cleaned_text: Chiropractor Baxter MN Welcome to Axness Integrative Medicine in Baxter, MN. We have been providing a full scope of all-natural pain-relief, preventive medicine, and physical therapy services to patients throughout Baxter since 2012. meet our team The Axness Integrative Medicine team provides care with clinical excellence, in Baxter. Our team is here to help you and your family. patient reviews Don't take our word for it, hear what our patients have had to say about the care we provide. YOUR COMPLETE CHIROPRACTIC PLAN We provide effective natural health solutions that are designed just for you. We use the most advanced and researched treatment techniques to gently and effectively restore true health and create a customized plan for you. You receive a comprehensive initial consultation Examination is performed, and diagnostic/lab test are ordered Health care team meets to develop your customized plan Exam and test results are reviewed, and plan recommended A natural and conservative approach is taken You enjoy a healthy, high-quality life WHY OUR APPROACH IS DIFFERENT At Axness Integrative Medicine we offer an array of services not found in most healthcare settings. Our ability to offer the best in medical and alternative treatments in one location means that our patients have more options. Our team of medical providers, physical therapists, and chiropractors can develop a plan that can actually fix the reason for your pain and restore function. We commonly see patients that have acute or chronic neck pain, back pain, shoulder, hip, or knee pain, foot or wrist pain that have been to multiple providers and have not experienced relief of their pain. With our integrated medical team approach, we are able to help even the "toughest" case get out of pain (and stay out of pain) without drugs or surgery. While standard medical pain treatments focus on covering up symptoms, our team approach of medical pain specialists focuses on getting you out of pain and fixing the reason why the pain came on in the first place (so it doesn't come back)! Make today be the day that you change your life and your health. Schedule a free consultation today with our team so that we can get a better understanding of your needs. We will work with you one on one to help you overcome the pain you are experiencing. If you have been told there is nothing that can be done for your pain, we want to see you! If you have been told to just wait until the pain gets bad enough and then they will do surgery, we want to see you! If you have tried medication management, physical therapy, chiropractic care, and maybe even a previous surgery in the past and you still have pain, we want to see you! office hours Monday 8:00am - 12:30pm - 5:00pm Saturday Closed Sunday Closed TRUSTED PROVIDER: READ OUR REVIEWS
